title: null error after name
body: hey i'm having a "null" after my name in champ select and i cant type because of that , i'm also in no club so its pretty weird

replies.body:

same problem, in OCE. Begged my team not to ban {{champion:157}} when we had a {{champion:54}} {{champion:12}} comp. They banned him, I flamed, then I realised it was not their fault. I was completely chat blocked :(
unlucky :c NA seems to be fine but oh well guess alot of people have it so it wont take long to update
Nah. I just had the error in NA. Rip me.
i'm having the exact same problem! it happened today and it's really annoying -.- any suggestions, has anyone managed to fix it?
